Equipment Actions.Action 1: Club, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 2 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Fey Charm, The Dryad targets one humanoid or beast it can see and attempts to magically charm them.  The target is not under the Dryad's control but takes requests or actions in the most favorable way it can

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Dryad can cast a few druid spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic resistance, The Dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Speak with Beasts and Plants, The Dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language
Abilities.Ability 4: Tree Stride, Once per turn, the Dryad can use some movement to magically step into a living tree and emerge from a second living tree
